mapper.sql: ID, ItemName, Age, Min, Max, Reference
mapper.select:
select result.PatientName, result.Age, itemref.ItemId, itemref.ItemName, result.[Value], ref.[Min], ref.[Max], ref.Reference
from NanoCheckerRef ref,NanoCheckerResult result,NanoCheckerItemRef itemref WHERE ref.ItemName=result.ItemName and ref.ItemName=itemref.ItemId and result.[Value] BETWEEN ref.[Min] and ref.[Max] and result.PatientName=#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and result.TestTime=#{ptime} and ref.Age= CASE WHEN result.Age >=75 and result.ItemName='NT-proBNP' THEN 75 ELSE 0 END order by result.PatientName,result.ItemName
